mapper.select: select b.member_id,b.cut_dy,a.salon_name,b.pic_path,b.memo from salon_info as a left join my_history as b on a.salon_id = b.salon_id where member_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into image (img_id, salon_id, img_name) values (#{img_id},#{salon_id},#{img_name})
insert into video (video_id, salon_id, video_name) values (#{video_id},#{salon_id},#{video_name})
